5 module prg_densitymatrix_mod
6 
7  use bml
8  use prg_parallel_mod
9 
10  implicit none
11 
12  private !Everything is private by default
13 
14  integer, parameter :: dp = kind(1.0d0)
15 
16  public :: prg_build_density_t0, prg_check_idempotency, prg_get_eigenvalues
17  public :: prg_get_flevel, prg_build_density_t, prg_build_atomic_density
18  public :: prg_build_density_t_fermi, prg_get_flevel_nt, prg_build_density_t_fulldata
19  public :: prg_build_density_t_ed, prg_toeigenspace, prg_tocanonicalspace
20  public :: canon_dm_prt, prg_get_evalsdvalsevects, prg_build_density_fromevalsandevects

22 contains
23 
36  subroutine prg_build_density_t0(ham_bml, rho_bml, threshold, bndfil, eigenvalues_out)
37 
38  character(20) :: bml_type
39  integer :: i, norb
40  real(8), intent(in) :: bndfil, threshold
41  real(dp) :: nocc
42  real(dp), allocatable :: eigenvalues(:)
43  real(dp), allocatable, optional, intent(out) :: eigenvalues_out(:)
44  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml, aux_bml, eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml
45  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
46  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rho_bml
47  character(20) :: bml_dmode
48 
49  if (getnranks().gt.1)then
50  if (printrank() .eq. 1) print*,'prg_build_density_T0: BML_DMODE_DISTRIBUTED'
51  bml_dmode = bml_dmode_distributed
52  else
53  print*,'prg_build_density_T0: BML_DMODE_SEQUENTIAL'
54  bml_dmode = bml_dmode_sequential
55  endif
56 
57  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
58  bml_type = bml_get_deep_type(ham_bml)
59 
60  allocate(eigenvalues(norb))
61 
62  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,eigenvectors_bml,bml_dmode)
63 
64  call bml_diagonalize(ham_bml,eigenvalues,eigenvectors_bml)
65  if(present(eigenvalues_out))then
66  if(allocated(eigenvalues_out))deallocate(eigenvalues_out)
67  allocate(eigenvalues_out(norb))
68  eigenvalues_out = eigenvalues
69  endif
70 
71  nocc = norb*bndfil
72 
73  do i=1,norb !Reusing eigenvalues to apply the theta function.
74  if(real(i)-nocc < 0.0001_dp) then
75  eigenvalues(i) = 2.0_dp
76  elseif(abs(real(i)-real(nocc)) < 0.0001_dp) then
77  eigenvalues(i) = 2.0_dp
78  else
79  eigenvalues(i) = 0.0_dp
80  endif
81  enddo
82  if(abs(nocc - int(nocc)) > 0.01_dp)then
83  eigenvalues(int(nocc)+1) = 1.0_dp
84  endif
85 
86  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,occupation_bml,bml_dmode)
87  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, eigenvalues) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
88 
89  deallocate(eigenvalues)
90 
91  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux_bml,bml_dmode)
92  call bml_multiply(eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
93  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
94 
95  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux1_bml,bml_dmode)
96  call bml_transpose(eigenvectors_bml, aux1_bml)
97  call bml_deallocate(eigenvectors_bml)
98 
99  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, rho_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
100  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
101  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
102 
103  end subroutine prg_build_density_t0
104 
119  subroutine prg_build_density_t(ham_bml, rho_bml, threshold, bndfil, kbt, ef, eigenvalues_out)
120 
121  character(20) :: bml_type
122  integer :: i, norb
123  real(dp), intent(in) :: bndfil, threshold, kbt
124  real(dp), intent(inout) :: ef
125  real(dp) :: nocc, fleveltol, mlsi, efold
126  real(dp), allocatable :: eigenvalues(:)
127  real(dp), allocatable, optional, intent(out) :: eigenvalues_out(:)
128  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml, aux_bml, eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml
129  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
130  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rho_bml
131  logical :: err
132 
133  if (printrank() .eq. 1) then
134  write(*,*)"In get_density_t ..."
135  endif
136 
137  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
138  bml_type = bml_get_deep_type(ham_bml)
139 
140  allocate(eigenvalues(norb))
141  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,eigenvectors_bml)
142 
143  call bml_diagonalize(ham_bml,eigenvalues,eigenvectors_bml)
144 
145  if(present(eigenvalues_out))then
146  if(allocated(eigenvalues_out))deallocate(eigenvalues_out)
147  allocate(eigenvalues_out(norb))
148  eigenvalues_out = eigenvalues
149  endif
150 
151  fleveltol = 1.0e-11
152 
153  efold = ef
154  call prg_get_flevel_nt(eigenvalues,kbt,bndfil,fleveltol,ef,err)
155  if(err)then
156  ef = efold
157  call prg_get_flevel(eigenvalues,kbt,bndfil,fleveltol,ef,err)
158  endif
159  if(err)then
160  write(*,*)"WARNING: Ef/Chemical potential search failed. We'll use the previous one to proceed"
161  ef = efold
162  endif
163 
164  nocc = norb*bndfil
165 
166  do i=1,norb !Reusing eigenvalues to apply the theta function.
167  eigenvalues(i) = 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
168  enddo
169 
170  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,occupation_bml)
171  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, eigenvalues) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
172 
173  deallocate(eigenvalues)
174 
175  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux_bml)
176  call bml_multiply(eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
177  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
178 
179  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux1_bml)
180  call bml_transpose(eigenvectors_bml, aux1_bml)
181  call bml_deallocate(eigenvectors_bml)
182 
183  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, rho_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
184  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
185  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
186 
187  end subroutine prg_build_density_t
188 
189 
206  subroutine prg_build_density_t_fulldata(ham_bml, rho_bml, threshold, bndfil, kbt, ef, eigenvalues_out&
207  &, evects_bml, fvals)
208 
209  character(20) :: bml_type
210  integer :: i, norb
211  real(dp), intent(in) :: bndfil, threshold, kbt
212  real(dp), intent(inout) :: ef
213  real(dp) :: nocc, fleveltol, efold
214  real(dp), allocatable :: eigenvalues(:)
215  real(dp), allocatable, intent(inout) :: eigenvalues_out(:), fvals(:)
216  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml, aux_bml, occupation_bml
217  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
218  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rho_bml, evects_bml
219  logical :: err
220 
221  if (printrank() .eq. 1) then
222  write(*,*)"In get_density_t_fulldata ..."
223  endif
224 
225  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
226  bml_type = bml_get_deep_type(ham_bml)
227 
228  allocate(eigenvalues(norb))
229  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,evects_bml)
230 
231  call bml_diagonalize(ham_bml,eigenvalues,evects_bml)
232 
233  if(.not.allocated(eigenvalues_out))then
234  allocate(eigenvalues_out(norb))
235  allocate(fvals(norb))
236  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,evects_bml)
237  endif
238 
239  eigenvalues_out = eigenvalues
240 
241  fleveltol = 1.0e-11
242  fvals = 0.0_dp
243 
244  call prg_get_flevel_nt(eigenvalues,kbt,bndfil,fleveltol,ef,err)
245  if(err)call prg_get_flevel(eigenvalues,kbt,bndfil,fleveltol,ef,err)
246  if(err)then
247  write(*,*)"WARNING: Ef/Chemical potential search failed. We'll use the previous one to proceed"
248  ef = efold
249  endif
250 
251  nocc = norb*bndfil
252 
253  do i=1,norb !Aapply Fermi function.
254  fvals(i) = 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
255  enddo
256 
257  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,occupation_bml)
258  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, fvals) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
259 
260  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux_bml)
261  call bml_multiply(evects_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
262  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
263 
264  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux1_bml)
265  call bml_transpose(evects_bml, aux1_bml)
266 
267  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, rho_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
268  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
269  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
270 
271  end subroutine prg_build_density_t_fulldata
272 
273 
291  subroutine prg_build_density_t_ed(ham_bml, rho_bml, evects_bml, threshold, bndfil, kbt, ef, evals&
292  &, dvals, hindex, llsize, verbose)
293 
294  character(20) :: bml_type
295  integer, allocatable, intent(in) :: hindex(:,:)
296  integer :: i, j, jj, k, kk, l, norb, norbcore
297  integer, intent(in) :: llsize, verbose
298  real(dp), intent(in) :: bndfil, threshold, kbt
299  real(dp), intent(inout) :: ef
300  real(dp) :: nocc
301  real(dp), allocatable :: eigenvalues(:), row(:),fvals(:),ham(:,:),evects(:,:)
302  real(dp), allocatable, intent(inout) :: evals(:), dvals(:)
303  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml, aux_bml, occupation_bml
304  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
305  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rho_bml, evects_bml
306 
307  if (printrank() .eq. 1 .and. verbose >= 1) then
308  write(*,*)"In get_density_t_efd ..."
309  endif
310 
311  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
312  bml_type = bml_get_type(ham_bml)
313 
314  if(allocated(evals))then
315  deallocate(evals)
316  deallocate(dvals)
317  endif
318  allocate(evals(norb))
319  allocate(dvals(norb))
320  allocate(fvals(norb))
321  allocate(ham(norb,norb))
322  allocate(evects(norb,norb))
323  call bml_export_to_dense(ham_bml,ham)
324  if(bml_get_n(evects_bml) < 0)then
325  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,evects_bml)
326  endif
327  call eig(ham,evects,evals,'V',norb)
328  call bml_import_from_dense(bml_type,evects,evects_bml,0.0_dp,norb)
329  !call bml_diagonalize(ham_bml,evals,evects_bml)
330  write(*,*)"ham",ham(1,1),ham(1,2),ham(1,3)
331  deallocate(evects)
332  deallocate(ham)
333  call bml_print_matrix("evects",evects_bml,0,4,0,4)
334  write(*,*)"Evals",evals(1),evals(2),evals(3)
335  nocc = norb*bndfil
336 
337  do i=1,norb !Apply Fermi function.
338  fvals(i) = 2.0_dp*fermi(evals(i),ef,kbt)
339  enddo
340 
341  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,occupation_bml)
342  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, fvals) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
343 
344  deallocate(fvals)
345 
346  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux_bml)
347  call bml_multiply(evects_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
348  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
349 
350  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux1_bml)
351  call bml_transpose(evects_bml, aux1_bml)
352 
353  allocate(row(norb))
354  dvals = 0.0_dp
355  do i = 1,norb
356  call bml_get_row(aux1_bml,i,row)
357  do k = 1,llsize
358  do l = hindex(1,k),hindex(2,k)
359  dvals(i) = dvals(i) + row(l)**2
360  enddo
361  enddo
362  enddo
363  deallocate(row)
364 
365  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, rho_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
366 
367  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
368  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
369 
370  end subroutine prg_build_density_t_ed
371 
372 
385  subroutine prg_get_evalsdvalsevects(ham_bml, threshold, hindex,&
386  & llsize, evals, dvals, evects_bml, verbose)
387 
388  character(20) :: bml_type
389  integer, allocatable, intent(in) :: hindex(:,:)
390  integer :: i, k, l, norb
391  integer, intent(in) :: llsize, verbose
392  real(dp), intent(in) :: threshold
393  real(dp), allocatable :: row(:),ham(:,:),evects(:,:),aux(:,:)
394  real(dp), allocatable, intent(inout) :: evals(:), dvals(:)
395  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
396  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: evects_bml
397  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml
398 
399  if (printrank() .eq. 1 .and. verbose >= 1) then
400  write(*,*)"In get_evalsDvalsEvects ..."
401  endif
402 
403  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
404  bml_type = bml_get_type(ham_bml)
405 
406  if(.not.allocated(evals))allocate(evals(norb))
407  if(.not.allocated(dvals))allocate(dvals(norb))
408  !allocate(ham(norb,norb))
409  !allocate(evects(norb,norb))
410  !call bml_export_to_dense(ham_bml,ham)
411  if(.not. bml_allocated(evects_bml))then
412  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,evects_bml)
413  endif
414  !call Eig(ham,evects,evals,'V',norb)
415  !call bml_import_from_dense(bml_type,evects,evects_bml,0.0_dp,norb)
416  call bml_diagonalize(ham_bml,evals,evects_bml)
417  !deallocate(evects)
418  !deallocate(ham)
419 
420  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux1_bml)
421  call bml_transpose(evects_bml, aux1_bml)
422  allocate(aux(norb,norb))
423  call bml_export_to_dense(aux1_bml,aux)
424  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
425 
426  allocate(row(norb))
427  dvals = 0.0_dp
428  do i = 1,norb
429  !call bml_get_row(aux1_bml,i,row)
430  row(:) = aux(i,:)
431  do k = 1,llsize
432  do l = hindex(1,k),hindex(2,k)
433  dvals(i) = dvals(i) + row(l)**2
434  enddo
435  enddo
436  enddo
437  deallocate(row)
438  deallocate(aux)
439 
440  end subroutine prg_get_evalsdvalsevects
441 
442 
452  subroutine prg_build_density_fromevalsandevects(evects_bml, evals, rho_bml, threshold,&
453  & bndfil, kbt, ef, verbose)
454 
455  character(20) :: bml_type
456  integer :: i, norb
457  integer, intent(in) :: verbose
458  real(dp), intent(in) :: bndfil, threshold, kbt
459  real(dp), intent(inout) :: ef
460  real(dp) :: nocc
461  real(dp), intent(in) :: evals(*)
462  real(dp), allocatable :: fvals(:)
463  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml, aux_bml, occupation_bml
464  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: evects_bml
465  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rho_bml
466 
467  if (printrank() .eq. 1 .and. verbose >= 1) then
468  write(*,*)"In get_density_fromEvalsAndEvects ..."
469  endif
470 
471  norb = bml_get_n(evects_bml)
472  bml_type = bml_get_type(evects_bml)
473 
474  allocate(fvals(norb))
475 
476  nocc = norb*bndfil
477 
478  do i=1,norb !Apply Fermi function.
479  fvals(i) = 2.0_dp*fermi(evals(i),ef,kbt)
480  enddo
481 
482  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,occupation_bml)
483  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, fvals) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
484 
485  deallocate(fvals)
486 
487  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux_bml)
488  call bml_multiply(evects_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp,threshold)
489  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
490 
491  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux1_bml)
492  call bml_transpose(evects_bml, aux1_bml)
493 
494  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, rho_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
495 
496  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
497  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
498 
499  end subroutine prg_build_density_fromevalsandevects
500 
501 
502 
513  subroutine prg_build_density_t_fermi(ham_bml, rho_bml, threshold, kbt, ef, verbose, drho)
514 
515  character(20) :: bml_type
516  integer :: i, norb, mdim
517  integer, optional, intent(in) :: verbose
518  real(dp), intent(in) :: threshold, kbt
519  real(dp), intent(in) :: ef
520  real(dp) :: fleveltol
521  real(dp), allocatable :: eigenvalues(:)
522  real(dp), allocatable :: nocc(:)
523  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux1_bml, aux_bml, eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml
524  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
525  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rho_bml
526  real(dp), optional, intent(inout) :: drho ! gradient of density w.r.t. ef
527 
528  if (printrank() .eq. 1) then
529  if(present(verbose))then
530  if(verbose >= 1)then
531  write(*,*)"In get_density_t_Fermi ..."
532  write(*,*)"Ef = ",ef
533  endif
534  endif
535  endif
536 
537  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
538  mdim = bml_get_m(ham_bml)
539  bml_type = bml_get_deep_type(ham_bml)
540 
541  allocate(eigenvalues(norb),nocc(norb))
542  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,mdim,eigenvectors_bml)
543 
544  call bml_diagonalize(ham_bml,eigenvalues,eigenvectors_bml)
545 
546  do i=1,norb !Reusing eigenvalues to apply the theta function.
547  nocc(i) = 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
548  enddo
549 
550  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,mdim,occupation_bml)
551  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, nocc) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
552 
553  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,mdim,aux_bml)
554  call bml_multiply(eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
555  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
556 
557  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,mdim,aux1_bml)
558  call bml_transpose(eigenvectors_bml, aux1_bml)
559 
560  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, rho_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
561 
562  if (present(drho)) then
563  do i=1,norb !Reusing eigenvalues to apply the theta function.
564  nocc(i) = 2.0_dp * dfermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
565  enddo
566 
567  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,mdim,occupation_bml)
568  call bml_set_diagonal(occupation_bml, nocc) !eps(i,i) = eps(i)
569 
570  call bml_multiply(eigenvectors_bml, occupation_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
571 
572  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,mdim,aux1_bml)
573  call bml_transpose(eigenvectors_bml, aux1_bml)
574 
575  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, aux1_bml, occupation_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold)
576  drho = bml_trace(occupation_bml)
577  call bml_deallocate(occupation_bml)
578  endif
579 
580  deallocate(nocc)
581  deallocate(eigenvalues)
582  call bml_deallocate(eigenvectors_bml)
583  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
584  call bml_deallocate(aux1_bml)
585 
586  end subroutine prg_build_density_t_fermi
587 
597  subroutine prg_build_atomic_density(rhoat_bml,numel,hindex,spindex,norb,bml_type)
598 
599  character(len=*), intent(in) :: bml_type
600  integer :: i, index, n_orb, nats
601  integer, intent(in) :: hindex(:,:), norb, spindex(:)
602  real(dp) :: occ
603  real(dp), allocatable :: d_atomic(:), rhoat(:)
604  real(dp), intent(in) :: numel(:)
605  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: rhoat_bml
606 
607  nats = size(hindex,dim=2)
608 
609  allocate(rhoat(norb))
610 
611  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,rhoat_bml)
612 
613  index = 0;
614 
615  do i = 1,nats
616  n_orb = hindex(2,i)-hindex(1,i) + 1;
617  if(n_orb == 1)then
618  index = index + 1;
619  rhoat(index) = numel(spindex(i));
620  else
621  if(numel(spindex(i)) <= 2)then
622  index = index + 1;
623  rhoat(index) = numel(spindex(i));
624  index = index + 1;
625  rhoat(index) = 0.0_dp;
626  index = index + 1;
627  rhoat(index) = 0.0_dp;
628  index = index + 1;
629  rhoat(index) = 0.0_dp;
630  else
631  index = index + 1;
632  rhoat(index) = 2.0_dp;
633 
634  index = index + 1;
635  occ = (numel(spindex(i))-2.0_dp)/3.0_dp;
636  rhoat(index) = occ;
637  index = index + 1;
638  rhoat(index) = occ;
639  index = index + 1;
640  rhoat(index) = occ;
641  endif
642  endif
643  enddo
644 
645  call bml_set_diagonal(rhoat_bml,rhoat,0.0_dp)
646 
647  deallocate(rhoat)
648 
649  end subroutine prg_build_atomic_density
650 
661  subroutine prg_get_flevel(eigenvalues,kbt,bndfil,tol,Ef,err)
662 
663  integer :: i, j, k, m
664  integer :: norb
665  real(dp) :: ft1, ft2, kb, prod
666  real(dp) :: t, step, tol, nel
667  real(dp), intent(in) :: bndfil, eigenvalues(:), kbt
668  real(dp), intent(inout) :: ef
669  logical, intent(inout) :: err
670 
671  norb = size(eigenvalues,dim=1)
672  nel = bndfil*2.0_dp*norb
673  ef=eigenvalues(1)
674  step=abs((eigenvalues(norb)-eigenvalues(1)))
675  ft1=0.0_dp
676  ft2=0.0_dp
677  prod=0.0_dp
678 
679  !Sum of the occupations
680  do i=1,norb
681  ft1 = ft1 + 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
682  enddo
683  ft1=ft1-nel
684 
685  err = .false.
686  do m=1,1000001
687 
688  if(m.gt.1000000)then
689  err = .true.
690  write(*,*) "WARNING: Bisection method in prg_get_flevel not converging ..."
691  endif
692 
693  if(abs(ft1).lt.tol)then !tolerance control
694  return
695  endif
696 
697  ef = ef + step
698 
699  ft2=0.0_dp
700 
701  !New sum of the occupations
702  do i=1,norb
703  ft2 = ft2 + 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
704  enddo
705 
706  ft2=ft2-nel
707 
708  !Product to see the change in sign.
709  prod = ft2*ft1
710 
711  if(prod.lt.0)then
712  ef=ef-step
713  step=step/2.0_dp !If the root is inside we shorten the step.
714  else
715  ft1=ft2 !If not, Ef moves forward.
716  endif
717 
718  enddo
719 
720  end subroutine prg_get_flevel
721 
733  subroutine prg_get_flevel_nt(eigenvalues,kbt,bndfil,tol,ef,err,verbose)
734 
735  integer :: i, m
736  integer :: norb
737  real(dp) :: ef0, f1, f2, nel
738  real(dp) :: step
739  real(dp), intent(in) :: bndfil, kbt
740  real(dp), intent(in) :: tol, eigenvalues(:)
741  real(dp), intent(inout) :: ef
742  integer, optional, intent(in) :: verbose
743  logical, intent(inout) :: err
744 
745  norb = size(eigenvalues, dim=1)
746  nel = bndfil*2.0_dp*real(norb,dp)
747  ef0 = ef
748  f1 = 0.0_dp
749  f2 = 0.0_dp
750  step = 0.1_dp
751  err = .false.
752 
753  !$omp parallel do default(none) private(i) &
754  !$omp shared(eigenvalues,kbt,ef,norb) &
755  !$omp reduction(+:f1)
756  do i=1,norb
757  f1 = f1 + 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
758  enddo
759  !$omp end parallel do
760 
761  f1=f1-nel
762  ef = ef0 + step
763 
764  f2 = 0.0_dp
765 
766  !$omp parallel do default(none) private(i) &
767  !$omp shared(eigenvalues,kbt,ef,norb) &
768  !$omp reduction(+:f2)
769  do i=1,norb
770  f2 = f2 + 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
771  enddo
772  !$omp end parallel do
773 
774  f2=f2-nel
775  ef0 = ef
776  if(abs(f2 - f1) < 1.0d-5)then
777  err = .true.
778  return
779  endif
780 
781  ef = -f2*step/(f2-f1) + ef0
782  f1 = f2
783  step = ef - ef0
784 
785  do m = 1,101
786  if(m.gt.100)then
787  write(*,*) "WARNING: Newton method in prg_get_flevel_nt is not converging ..."
788  err = .true.
789  ef = ef0
790  exit
791  endif
792 
793  !New sum of the occupations
794  f2 = 0.0_dp
795  !$omp parallel do default(none) private(i) &
796  !$omp shared(eigenvalues,ef,kbt,norb) &
797  !$omp reduction(+:f2)
798  do i=1,norb
799  f2 = f2 + 2.0_dp*fermi(eigenvalues(i),ef,kbt)
800  enddo
801  !$omp end parallel do
802 
803  f2=f2-nel
804  ef0 = ef
805  ef = -f2*step/(f2-f1) + ef0
806  f1 = f2
807  step = ef - ef0
808  if(abs(f1).lt.tol)then !tolerance control
809  return
810  endif
811  enddo
812 
813  end subroutine prg_get_flevel_nt
814 
815 
821  subroutine prg_get_eigenvalues(ham_bml,eigenvalues,verbose)
822 
823  character(20) :: bml_type
824  integer :: i, norb
825  integer, intent(in) :: verbose
826  real(dp) :: nocc
827  real(dp), allocatable :: aux(:,:)
828  real(dp), allocatable, intent(inout) :: eigenvalues(:)
829  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux_bml, eigenvectors_bml
830  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: ham_bml
831 
832  norb = bml_get_n(ham_bml)
833  bml_type = bml_get_deep_type(ham_bml)
834 
835  if(verbose.ge.1)write(*,*)"In prg_get_eigenvalues ..."
836  if(verbose.ge.1)write(*,*)"Number of states =",norb
837 
838  if(.not.allocated(eigenvalues))allocate(eigenvalues(norb))
839 
840  !Ensure dense type to diagonalize
841  if(trim(bml_type).ne."dense")then
842  allocate(aux(norb,norb))
843  call bml_export_to_dense(ham_bml,aux)
844  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_matrix_dense,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,aux_bml)
845  call bml_import_from_dense(bml_matrix_dense,aux,aux_bml,0.0_dp,norb)
846  deallocate(aux)
847  else
848  call bml_copy_new(ham_bml,aux_bml)
849  endif
850 
851  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_matrix_dense,bml_element_real,dp,norb,norb,eigenvectors_bml)
852 
853  call bml_diagonalize(aux_bml,eigenvalues,eigenvectors_bml)
854 
855  call bml_deallocate(eigenvectors_bml)
856  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
857 
858  end subroutine prg_get_eigenvalues
859 
860 
866  subroutine prg_check_idempotency(mat_bml, threshold, idempotency)
867 
868  character(20) :: bml_type
869  integer :: n, i, j
870  real(dp), intent(in) :: threshold
871  real(dp), intent(out) :: idempotency
872  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux_bml
873  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: mat_bml
874 
875  call bml_copy_new(mat_bml, aux_bml)
876 
877  call bml_multiply(mat_bml, mat_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp, threshold) !A^2
878  call bml_add_deprecated(1.0_dp,aux_bml,-1.0_dp,mat_bml, threshold) !A^2 - A
879 
880  idempotency = bml_fnorm(aux_bml)
881 
882  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
883 
884  end subroutine prg_check_idempotency
885 
890  real(dp) function fermi(e,ef,kbt)
891 
892  real(dp), intent(in) :: e, ef, kbt
893 
894  if ((e-ef)/kbt > 100.0_dp) then
895  fermi = 0.0_dp
896  else
897  fermi = 1.0_dp/(1.0_dp+exp((e-ef)/(kbt)))
898  endif
899 
900  end function fermi
901 
906  real(dp) function dfermi(e,ef,kbt)
907 
908  real(dp), intent(in) :: e, ef, kbt
909 
910  dfermi = 0.0_dp
911  if ((e-ef)/kbt > 100.0_dp) then
912  if (abs(e-ef)<0.001_dp) then
913  dfermi = - 1000.0_dp
914  endif
915  else
916  dfermi = 1.0_dp/(1.0_dp+exp((e-ef)/(kbt)))
917  dfermi = dfermi * dfermi * exp((e-ef)/(kbt)) * 1.0_dp/kbt
918  endif
919 
920  end function dfermi
921 
932  subroutine prg_toeigenspace(mat_bml,matEig_bml,evects_bml,threshold,verbose)
933 
934  integer, optional, intent(in) :: verbose
935  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: mat_bml, evects_bml
936  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: mateig_bml
937  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux_bml
938  real(dp), intent(in) :: threshold
939  integer :: hdim, mdim
940  character(20) :: bml_type
941 
942  if(verbose.eq.1) write(*,*)"In prg_toEigenspace ..."
943 
944  hdim= bml_get_n(mat_bml)
945  mdim= bml_get_m(mat_bml)
946  bml_type = bml_get_type(mat_bml)
947  !Allocate bml's
948  if(bml_get_n(mateig_bml) < 0)then
949  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,hdim ,mdim,mateig_bml, &
950  & bml_get_distribution_mode(mat_bml))
951  endif
952  !Do the operations in bml
953  call bml_transpose(evects_bml, aux_bml)
954 
955  call bml_multiply(aux_bml, mat_bml, mateig_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp,threshold) !U^t*O
956 
957  call bml_multiply(mateig_bml, evects_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp,threshold) !U^t*O * U
958 
959  call bml_copy(aux_bml, mateig_bml)
960 
961  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
962 
963  end subroutine prg_toeigenspace
964 
968  !transformations
969  !! constructed from the eigenvectors of a Hamiltonian
970  !! \param mat_bml Operator to be transformed
971  !! \param matEig_bml Output operator after transformation
972  !! \param evects_bml Eigenvectors matrix (U)
973  !! \param threshold Threshold parameter
974  !! \verbose Verbosity level
975  !!
976  subroutine prg_tocanonicalspace(mat_bml,matCan_bml,evects_bml,threshold,verbose)
977 
978  integer, optional, intent(in) :: verbose
979  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(in) :: mat_bml, evects_bml
980  type(bml_matrix_t), intent(inout) :: matcan_bml
981  type(bml_matrix_t) :: aux_bml
982  real(dp), intent(in) :: threshold
983  integer :: hdim, mdim
984  character(20) :: bml_type
985 
986  if(verbose.eq.1) write(*,*)"In prg_toCacninicalspace ..."
987 
988  hdim= bml_get_n(mat_bml)
989  mdim= bml_get_m(mat_bml)
990  bml_type = bml_get_type(mat_bml)
991 
992  !Allocate bml's
993  if(bml_get_n(matcan_bml) < 0)then
994  call bml_zero_matrix(bml_type,bml_element_real,dp,hdim ,mdim,matcan_bml,&
995  & bml_get_distribution_mode(mat_bml))
996  endif
997 
998  !Do the operations in bml
999 
1000  call bml_transpose(evects_bml, aux_bml)
1001  call bml_multiply(mat_bml, aux_bml, matcan_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp,threshold) !O*U^t
1002 
1003  call bml_multiply(evects_bml,matcan_bml, aux_bml, 1.0_dp, 0.0_dp,threshold) !U*O * U^t
1004 
1005  call bml_copy(aux_bml, matcan_bml)
1006 
1007  call bml_deallocate(aux_bml)
1008 
1009  end subroutine prg_tocanonicalspace
1010 
1011 
1012  subroutine canon_dm_prt(P1,H1,Nocc,T,Q,e,mu0,m,HDIM)
1013 
1014  implicit none
1015  integer, parameter :: prec = 8
1016  real(prec), parameter :: one = 1.d0, two = 2.d0, zero = 0.d0
1017  integer, intent(in) :: hdim, m ! Nocc = Number of occupied orbitals, m
1018  real(prec), intent(in) :: h1(hdim,hdim), q(hdim,hdim), e(hdim), nocc !
1019  real(prec), intent(out) :: p1(hdim,hdim) ! Density matrix response derivative
1020  real(prec), intent(in) :: t, mu0 ! Electronic temperature and chemicalpotential
1021  real(prec) :: x(hdim,hdim), dx1(hdim,hdim), y(hdim,hdim) !Temporary matrices
1022  real(prec) :: h_0(hdim), p_0(hdim), dpdmu(hdim), p_02(hdim),id0(hdim)
1023  real(prec) :: beta, cnst, kb, mu1, sumdpdmu
1024  integer :: i, j, k, norbscore
1025 
1026  kb = 8.61739e-5 ! (eV/K)
1027  beta = 1.d0/(kb*t) ! Temp in Kelvin
1028  h_0 = e ! Diagonal Hamiltonian H0 respresented in the
1029  cnst = beta/(1.d0*2**(m+2)) ! Scaling constant
1030  p_0 = 0.5d0 + cnst*(h_0-mu0) ! Initialization for P0 represented in
1031 
1032  ! call MMult(ONE,Q,H1,ZERO,X,'T','N',HDIM) ! Main cost are the
1033  ! transformation
1034  ! call MMult(ONE,X,Q,ZERO,Y,'N','N',HDIM) ! to the eigenbasis of H1
1035  ! P1 = -cnst*Y !(set mu1 = 0 for simplicity) ! Initialization of DM response
1036  ! (not diagonal in Q)
1037  p1 = -cnst*h1 !(set mu1 = 0 for simplicity) ! Initialization of DM response
1038 
1039 
1040  do i = 1,m ! Loop over m recursion steps
1041  p_02 = p_0*p_0
1042  do j = 1,hdim
1043  do k = 1,hdim
1044  dx1(k,j) = p_0(k)*p1(k,j) + p1(k,j)*p_0(j)
1045  enddo
1046  enddo
1047  id0 = 1.d0/(2.d0*(p_02-p_0)+1.d0)
1048  p_0 = id0*p_02
1049  do j = 1,hdim
1050  do k = 1,hdim
1051  p1(k,j) = id0(k)*(dx1(k,j) + 2.d0*(p1(k,j)-dx1(k,j))*p_0(j))
1052  enddo
1053  enddo
1054  enddo
1055  dpdmu = beta*p_0*(1.d0-p_0)
1056  mu1 = 0.d0
1057  sumdpdmu = 0.d0
1058  !do i = 1,HDIM
1059  do i = 1,norbscore
1060  mu1 = mu1 + p1(i,i)
1061  sumdpdmu = sumdpdmu + dpdmu(i)
1062  enddo
1063  write(*,*)"mu1",mu1
1064 
1065  !mu1 = -mu1/SUM(dPdmu)
1066  mu1 = -mu1/sumdpdmu
1067  do i = 1,hdim
1068  p1(i,i) = p1(i,i) + mu1*dpdmu(i) ! Trace correction by adding (dP/dmu)*(dmu/dH1) to dP/dH1
1069  enddo
1070 
1071  ! call MMult(ONE,Q,P1,ZERO,X,'N','N',HDIM) ! and back transformation of P1,
1072  ! with a total of
1073  ! call MMult(ONE,X,Q,ZERO,P1,'N','T',HDIM) ! 4 matrix-matrix multiplication
1074  ! dominates the cost
1075 
1076  end subroutine canon_dm_prt
1077 
1078  subroutine eig(A,Q,ee,TYPE,HDIM)
1079 
1080  implicit none
1081  integer, parameter :: PREC = 8
1082  integer, intent(in) :: HDIM
1083  integer :: INFO
1084  integer :: DIAG_LWORK
1085  real(PREC) :: DIAG_WORK(1+6*HDIM+2*HDIM*HDIM)
1086  integer :: DIAG_LIWORK
1087  integer :: DIAG_IWORK(3+5*HDIM)
1088  real(PREC), intent(in) :: A(HDIM,HDIM)
1089  real(PREC), intent(out) :: Q(HDIM,HDIM), ee(HDIM)
1090  real(PREC) :: EVECS(HDIM,HDIM), EVALS(HDIM)
1091  character(LEN=1), parameter :: JOBZ = "V", uplo = "U"
1092  character(1), intent(in) :: TYPE ! 'N'(for eigenvaules only) or 'V'(otherwise)
1093 
1094  diag_lwork = 1+6*hdim+2*hdim*hdim
1095  diag_liwork = 3 + 5*hdim
1096 
1097  evecs = a
1098  CALL dsyevd(jobz, uplo, hdim, evecs, hdim, evals, &
1099  diag_work, diag_lwork, diag_iwork, diag_liwork, info)
1100 
1101  q = evecs
1102  ee = evals
1103 
1104  end subroutine eig
1105 
1106
